text: Lucía Guilmáin (3 August 1942 - 15 February 2021) was a Mexican actress. She was born in Mexico City. Her career began in 1965. She retired in 2016. Guilmáin was known for her roles in Las fuerzas vivas (1975), Length of War (1976) and Darker Than Night (2014). Guilmáin died on 15 February 2021 in Mexico City, aged 78.Murió Lucía Guilmáin, primera actriz mexicana, a los 83 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Lucía Guilmáin
